name: RTCIceTransport.onstatechange
description: The onstatechange event handler for the RTCIceTransport interface is a property which specifies a function to serve as the EventHandler for the statechange event that is fired whenever the transport's state changes.

refs.name: WebRTC 1.0: Real-time Communication Between Browsers
